## lib-ethers package

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [BlockPolledStabilioStore](./lib-ethers.blockpolledstabiliostore.md) | Ethers-based [StabilioStore](./lib-base.stabiliostore.md) that updates state whenever there's a new block. |
|  [EthersStabilio](./lib-ethers.ethersstabilio.md) | Convenience class that combines multiple interfaces of the library in one object. |
|  [EthersTransactionCancelledError](./lib-ethers.etherstransactioncancellederror.md) | Thrown when a transaction is cancelled or replaced by a different transaction. |
|  [EthersTransactionFailedError](./lib-ethers.etherstransactionfailederror.md) | Thrown by [EthersStabilio](./lib-ethers.ethersstabilio.md) in case of transaction failure. |
|  [PopulatableEthersStabilio](./lib-ethers.populatableethersstabilio.md) | Ethers-based implementation of [PopulatableStabilio](./lib-base.populatablestabilio.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [PopulatedEthersRedemption](./lib-ethers.populatedethersredemption.md) | A redemption transaction that has been prepared for sending. |
|  [PopulatedEthersStabilioTransaction](./lib-ethers.populatedethersstabiliotransaction.md) | A transaction that has been prepared for sending. |
|  [ReadableEthersStabilio](./lib-ethers.readableethersstabilio.md) | Ethers-based implementation of [ReadableStabilio](./lib-base.readablestabilio.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [SendableEthersStabilio](./lib-ethers.sendableethersstabilio.md) | Ethers-based implementation of [SendableStabilio](./lib-base.sendablestabilio.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [SentEthersStabilioTransaction](./lib-ethers.sentethersstabiliotransaction.md) | A transaction that has already been sent. |
|  [UnsupportedNetworkError](./lib-ethers.unsupportednetworkerror.md) | Thrown when trying to connect to a network where Stabilio is not deployed. |

|  [BorrowingOperationOptionalParams](./lib-ethers.borrowingoperationoptionalparams.md) | Optional parameters of a transaction that borrows XBRL. |

|  [EthersStabilioConnection](./lib-ethers.ethersstabilioconnection.md) | Information about a connection to the Stabilio protocol. |
|  [EthersStabilioConnectionOptionalParams](./lib-ethers.ethersstabilioconnectionoptionalparams.md) | Optional parameters of [ReadableEthersStabilio.connect()](./lib-ethers.readableethersstabilio.connect_1.md) and [EthersStabilio.connect()](./lib-ethers.ethersstabilio.connect_1.md)<!-- -->. |

|  [EthersTransactionOverrides](./lib-ethers.etherstransactionoverrides.md) | Optional parameters taken by [EthersStabilio](./lib-ethers.ethersstabilio.md) transaction functions. |
|  [ReadableEthersStabilioWithStore](./lib-ethers.readableethersstabiliowithstore.md) | Variant of [ReadableEthersStabilio](./lib-ethers.readableethersstabilio.md) that exposes a [StabilioStore](./lib-base.stabiliostore.md)<!-- -->. |
